info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases, servers, and other entities.
info.title: SqlManagementClient

parameters.description: The name of the region where the resource is located.
parameters.name: locationName

200.description: Successfully retrieved collection of sync database ids.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidSyncGroupCreateOrUpdateRequest - The create or update sync group request body is empty.

 * 400 InvalidSyncMemberCreateOrUpdateRequest - The create or update sync member request body is empty.

 * 400 InvalidSyncAgentCreateOrUpdateRequest - The create or update sync agent request body is empty.

 * 400 InvalidDatabaseResourceId - Invalid database resource identifier.

 * 400 MismatchingSubscriptionWithUrl - The provided subscription did not match the subscription in the Url.

 * 400 InvalidSyncAgentResourceId - Invalid sync agent resource identifier.

 * 400 MismatchingResourceGroupNameWithUrl - The provided resource group name did not match the name in the Url.

 * 400 MismatchingServerNameWithUrl - The provided server name did not match the name in the Url.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 DatabaseDoesNotExist - User has specified a database name that does not exist on this server instance.

ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.
ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version

ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

SyncGroup.description: The requested sync group resource state.

SyncDatabaseIdListResult.description: A list of sync database ID properties.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

SyncDatabaseIdProperties.description: Properties of the sync database id.

id.description: ARM resource id of sync database.

SyncFullSchemaProperties.description: Properties of the database full schema.

lastUpdateTime.description: Last update time of the database schema.

tables.description: List of tables in the database full schema.

SyncFullSchemaPropertiesListResult.description: A list of sync schema properties.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

SyncFullSchemaTable.description: Properties of the table in the database full schema.

columns.description: List of columns in the table of database full schema.

hasError.description: If there is error in the table.

SyncFullSchemaTableColumn.description: Properties of the column in the table of database full schema.

hasError.description: If there is error in the table.

isPrimaryKey.description: If it is the primary key of the table.

SyncGroup.description: An Azure SQL Database sync group.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

SyncGroupLogListResult.description: A list of sync group log properties.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

SyncGroupLogProperties.description: Properties of an Azure SQL Database sync group log.

details.description: Details of the sync group log.

operationStatus.description: OperationStatus of the sync group log.

source.description: Source of the sync group log.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the sync group log.

tracingId.description: TracingId of the sync group log.

type.description: Type of the sync group log.

conflictResolutionPolicy.description: Conflict resolution policy of the sync group.

hubDatabasePassword.description: Password for the sync group hub database credential.

hubDatabaseUserName.description: User name for the sync group hub database credential.

interval.description: Sync interval of the sync group.

lastSyncTime.description: Last sync time of the sync group.

schema.description: Sync schema of the sync group.

syncDatabaseId.description: ARM resource id of the sync database in the sync group.

syncState.description: Sync state of the sync group.

masterSyncMemberName.description: Name of master sync member where the schema is from.

tables.description: List of tables in sync group schema.

SyncGroupSchemaTable.description: Properties of table in sync group schema.

columns.description: List of columns in sync group schema.

quotedName.description: Quoted name of sync group schema table.

SyncGroupSchemaTableColumn.description: Properties of column in sync group table.

quotedName.description: Quoted name of sync group table column.
